name: batch_update_document
description: Applies a batch of updates to a document.

documentId.description: The unique identifier for the document to update.

index.description:
The zero-based index in the document's content
                           where the text will be inserted.

location.description: Specifies where to insert the text.

documentStyle.description:
The new document style to apply. The specific
                               structure of this dictionary will depend on how
                               document styles are defined in your system.

requests.description: A list of update requests, where each request is a dictionary containing a single key that identifies the request type (e.g., `insertText`) and a value that specifies the request's parameters.

userId.description: The ID of the user, which defaults to `"me"`.

name: create_document
description: Create a new document and return its data.

title.description: The document's title, defaulting to "Untitled Document".

userId.description: The user's ID; defaults to `me` and must be a non-empty string.

name: get_document
description: Get a document by ID, including its associated comments, replies, labels, and access proposals.

documentId.description: The ID of the document to retrieve; must not be empty or whitespace.

suggestionsViewMode.description: The mode for viewing suggestions; use "DEFAULT" or "SUGGESTIONS_INLINE", or `None` to preserve the document's existing setting.

includeTabsContent.description: Whether to include tab content. Defaults to False.

userId.description: The ID of the user performing the action; defaults to `"me"` and cannot be empty or whitespace.
